import React,{useState} from 'react'; function App() { const[formData, setformData] = useState( { firstName:"", lastName: "", email:"", country:"", street:"", city: "", state: "" , zip: "" } ) console.log(formData); function handleForm(event){ setformData(prevformData => { return{ ...prevformData, [event.target.name] : event.target.value } }) } return (
















); } export default App;
